mapper.select: /*창고정보*/ SELECT * FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역 ST102TB*/ WHERE 1=1 AND S1.APY_YM = #{baseYm} AND (S1.WARE_DV_CD IN ('2') OR S1.WARE_NO = '100002') AND S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN ('10','20') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY S1.SORT_DV_VAL, S1.WARE_NO

WITH PART_INF AS ( /*품목정보*/ SELECT P1.PD_CD , P2.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ , P2.PD_ABBR_NM AS PD_NM /*품목명*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL15 /*기초자재*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL17 /*자재관리유형, AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD, MAT_MNGT_DV_CD*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL21 /*AS자재 공통분류, AS_MAT_CMN_CLSF_CD, CMN_PART_DV_CD*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL30 /*회전율 대상여부, TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN*/ FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' /*상품유형코드 : C 복합상품, P 기준상품, S 서비스, M 교재제품, Y 융합상품*/ AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' /*품목구분(Default : 상품, - 전체 항목 : 상품, 홈카페캡슐, 필터, AS자재, 판매사은품, AS소모품, LP활동물품, 모종, 웰스팜AS자재, 공구)*/
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKndCd} /*AS자재 품목종류, AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD, ITM_KND_CD*/
/*사용여부(전체, 사용, 미사용)*/
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL32 = #{useYn} /*화면노출여부, UI_EXPSR_YN*/
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{itmGrpCd} /* 품목종류 */ /*AS_MAT_ITM_KND_CD*/
/*관리유형(전체, 기초1, 기초2, 기초3, 기초4, 기초5) 전체 : ALL*/
AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL17 = #{stockTpCd}
AND P2.SAP_MAT_CD >= LPAD(#{strtSapCd}, 18, '0') AND P2.SAP_MAT_CD <= LPAD(#{endSapCd}, 18, '0')
AND P2.SAP_MAT_CD LIKE #{strtSapCd} ||'%'
AND P2.SAP_MAT_CD LIKE #{endSapCd} ||'%'
AND P1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} /* 품목코드 */
-- AND (P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7', '8', '9', '91', '92', '93', '95', '96') -- OR P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 IS NULL) ) , WARE_IF AS ( /*창고정보*/ SELECT S1.APY_YM, S1.WARE_NO, S1.HGR_WARE_NO, S1.WARE_DV_CD, S1.WARE_ICHR_NO FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역 ST102TB*/ WHERE 1=1 AND S1.APY_YM = #{baseYm} AND (S1.WARE_DV_CD IN ('2') OR S1.WARE_NO = '100002') AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY S1.APY_YM, S1.WARE_NO ) , BASE_QTY_INF AS ( /*창고별품목별 기준년월 기초/기말재고(물류 = 물류창고, 서비스센터 = 센터조직+하위엔지니어)*/ SELECT (CASE WHEN W1.WARE_ICHR_NO NOT LIKE '000' THEN W1.HGR_WARE_NO ELSE S1.WARE_NO END) AS WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , SUM(S1.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY) AS BTD_STOC_GD_QTY , SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) AS PITM_STOC_GD_QTY -- , (CASE WHEN 'A' = 'A' THEN SUM(S1.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY) -- WHEN 'A' = 'B' THEN SUM(S1.BTD_STOC_B_GD_QTY) -- WHEN 'A' = 'E' THEN SUM(S1.BTD_STOC_E_GD_QTY) -- WHEN 'A' = 'R' THEN SUM(S1.BTD_STOC_R_GD_QTY) -- ELSE SUM(S1.BTD_STOC_A_GD_QTY) -- END) AS BTD_STOC_GD_QTY -- , (CASE WHEN 'A' = 'A' THEN SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) -- WHEN 'A' = 'B' THEN SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_B_GD_QTY) -- WHEN 'A' = 'E' THEN SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY) -- WHEN 'A' = 'R' THEN SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY) -- ELSE SUM(S1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) -- END) AS PITM_STOC_GD_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ S1 /*월별품목재고내역, ST122TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_IF W1 ON S1.BASE_YM = W1.APY_YM AND S1.WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY (CASE WHEN W1.WARE_ICHR_NO NOT LIKE '000' THEN W1.HGR_WARE_NO ELSE S1.WARE_NO END), S1.ITM_PD_CD ) , WK_OSTR_QTY_INF AS ( /*창고별품목별 기준년월 작업출고(서비스센터)*/ SELECT WARE_NO , ITM_PD_CD , SUM(USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN W1.WARE_ICHR_NO NOT LIKE '000' THEN W1.HGR_WARE_NO ELSE W1.WARE_NO END) AS WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , S1.USE_QTY AS USE_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S1 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_IF W1 ON S1.WK_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%'
AND S1.FNL_ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} /*조회 등급*/
AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD != '6' /*반품제외*/ AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.WK_WARE_NO != '100002'
UNION ALL /*창고별품목별 기준년월 작업출고(물류센터)*/ SELECT '100002' AS WARE_NO , S1.ITM_PD_CD , S1.USE_QTY AS USE_QTY FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ S1 /*서비스작업출고내역, ST163TB*/ INNER JOIN WARE_IF W1 ON S1.WK_WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%'
AND S1.FNL_ITM_GD_CD = #{itmGdCd} /*조회 등급*/
AND S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD != '6' /*반품제외*/ AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE 1=1
AND ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} /* 품목코드 */
GROUP BY WARE_NO, ITM_PD_CD ) , BASE AS ( SELECT B1.WARE_NO , P1.PD_CD , P1.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ , P1.PD_NM /*품목명*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /*기초자재 필터*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL17 AS AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD /*자재관리유형, AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD, MAT_MNGT_DV_CD*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS CMN_PART_DV_CD /*중수리 필터*/ , P1.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN /*회전율 필터*/ , NVL(B1.PITM_STOC_GD_QTY,0) AS PITM_STOC_GD_QTY /*창고별기말재고 - 시점재고*/ , B1.BTD_STOC_GD_QTY , NVL(W1.USE_QTY,0) AS USE_QTY FROM PART_INF P1 LEFT OUTER JOIN BASE_QTY_INF B1 ON P1.PD_CD = B1.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WK_OSTR_QTY_INF W1 ON P1.PD_CD = W1.ITM_PD_CD AND B1.WARE_NO = W1.WARE_NO INNER JOIN WARE_IF B2 ON B1.WARE_NO = B2.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND B1.WARE_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY P1.PD_CD, B1.WARE_NO ) , BASE_QTY AS ( SELECT PD_CD, WARE_NO, SUM(USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY FROM BASE GROUP BY WARE_NO, PD_CD ) , BASE_GROUP AS ( SELECT T1.WARE_NO , T1.PD_CD , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , T1.PD_NM , T1.ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN , T1.AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD , T1.CMN_PART_DV_CD , T1.TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN , T1.PITM_STOC_GD_QTY
-- 지속월 , (CASE WHEN NVL(T2.USE_QTY,0) != 0 THEN ROUND((((NVL(T1.BTD_STOC_GD_QTY,0) + NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_GD_QTY,0)) / 2)/ (NVL(T2.USE_QTY,0))), 2) ELSE 0 END) AS KEPP_MM /* 재고지속월 === round(((기초재고수량금액 + 기말재고수량금액) / 2) / 작업출고수량 금액), 2) */
-- 회전율 , (CASE WHEN (NVL(T1.BTD_STOC_GD_QTY,0) + NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_GD_QTY,0)) != 0 THEN ROUND(NVL(T1.USE_QTY,0) / ((NVL(T1.BTD_STOC_GD_QTY,0) + NVL(T1.PITM_STOC_GD_QTY,0)) / 2) * 100 , 2) ELSE 0 END) AS KEPP_MM
FROM BASE T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN BASE_QTY T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T1.WARE_NO = T2.WARE_NO ) SELECT T1.* -- T1.PD_CD -- , T1.SAP_MAT_CD -- , T1.PD_NM -- , T1.ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN -- , T1.AS_MAT_MNG_TP_CD -- , T1.CMN_PART_DV_CD -- , T1.TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN -- , ${wareNoPitmFields} -- , ${wareNoKeppMmFields} , ${wareNoPitmSumFields} AS WARE_NO_PITM_SUM_FIELDS FROM BASE_GROUP PIVOT( SUM(PITM_STOC_GD_QTY) AS PITM, SUM(KEPP_MM) AS KEPP FOR WARE_NO IN (${wareNoInStr}) ) T1
